worldInfo.title: Worlds/Lorebooks
worldInfo.pinToggle: Locked = World Editor will stay open
worldInfo.noWorldsActive: No Worlds active. Click here to select.
worldInfo.minActivationsHint: Scan chronologically until reached min entries or token budget.
worldInfo.minActivationsDisabledHint: (disabled when max recursion steps are used)
worldInfo.maxRecursionStepsHint: Cap the number of entry activation recursions
worldInfo.maxRecursionStepsDisabledHint:
0 = unlimited, 1 = scans once and doesn't recurse, etc
(disabled when min activations are used)
worldInfo.includeNamesHint: Include names with each message into the context for scanning
worldInfo.recursiveScanHint: Entries can activate other entries by mentioning their keywords
worldInfo.caseSensitiveHint: Lookup for the entry keys in the context will respect the case
worldInfo.matchWholeWordsHint: If the entry key consists of only one word, it would not be matched as part of other words
worldInfo.useGroupScoringHint: Only the entries with the most number of key matches will be selected for Inclusion Group filtering
worldInfo.alertOnOverflowHint: Alert if your world info is greater than the allocated budget.

backgrounds.autoSelectTooltip: Automatically select a background based on the chat context
backgrounds.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {fileName}?

errors.noChatLock: Select a chat to lock the background for it.

aiConfig.manualInputNote: Click slider numbers to input manually.

contextSize.label: Context Size (tokens)
contextSize.unlockedTooltip: Only enable this if your model supports context sizes greater than the slider's default maximum.

streaming.label: Streaming
streaming.description: Display the response bit by bit as it is generated. When this is off, responses will be displayed all at once when they are complete.

errors.csrfToken: Couldn't get CSRF token. Please refresh the page.

chat.inputPlaceholder: Type a message, or /? for help
chat.saveError: Cannot save: No active character selected.

generate.noPrompts: No prompts were built for the AI. Please check your prompt settings.
generate.errorFallback: Failed to get a response from the AI.

delete.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this message?
delete.confirmSwipeMessage: This is the last message. Do you want to delete just this swipe, or the entire message?
delete.noSwipesError: Message has no swipes to delete.

import.abortedMessage: Cannot import characters while generating. Stop the request and try again.
import.errorMessage: The file is likely invalid or corrupted.
import.tagImportAskNotImplemented: Tag import for "{characterName}" requires user input (not implemented yet).
import.tagImportExistingNotImplemented: "Import only existing tags" is not fully implemented yet.

save.noActive: Cannot save character: No active character or avatar found.
save.syncWarning: Character saved, but local list might be out of sync. Consider refreshing.

fetch.error: The active character is no longer available. The page will be refreshed to prevent data loss.
fetch.overflowWarning: Character data length limit reached. To resolve this, set "performance.lazyLoadCharacters" to "true" in config.yaml and restart the server.

switch.wait: Please wait until the chat is saved before switching characters.

rightMenu.pinToggle: Locked = Character Management panel will stay open
rightMenu.hotSwaps: Favorite characters to add them to HotSwaps
rightMenu.tokenInfo: Token counts may be inaccurate and provided just for reference.
rightMenu.bulkEdit:
Bulk edit characters

Click to toggle characters
Shift + Click to select/deselect a range of characters
Right-click for actions

characterEditor.avatar: Click to select a new avatar for this character
characterEditor.toggleSpoiler: Show / Hide Description and First Message
characterEditor.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe your character's physical and mental traits here.
characterEditor.firstMessagePlaceholder: This will be the first message from the character that starts every chat.

moreOptions.setAsWelcomeAssistant: Set / Unset as Welcome Page Assistant

advancedDefinitions.title: {characterName} - Advanced Definitions
advancedDefinitions.promptHint: Insert {'{{original}}'} into either box to include the respective default prompt.
advancedDefinitions.mainPromptPlaceholder: Any contents here will replace the default Main Prompt.
advancedDefinitions.postHistoryInstructionsPlaceholder: Any contents here will replace the default Post-History Instructions.
advancedDefinitions.characterVersionPlaceholder: (If you want to track character versions)
advancedDefinitions.creatorNotesPlaceholder: (Describe the bot, give use tips, etc.)
advancedDefinitions.talkativenessHint: How often the character speaks in group chats!
advancedDefinitions.dialogueExamplesHint: Important to set the character's writing style.
advancedDefinitions.dialogueExamplesPlaceholder: (Examples of chat dialog. Begin each example with <START> on a new line.)

extensions.title: Extensions
extensions.managePopupNotImplemented: Manage extensions popup not implemented yet.
extensions.installPopupNotImplemented: Install extension popup not implemented yet.

apiConnections.profileNotImplemented: Connection Profiles are not yet implemented.
apiConnections.keyPrivacy: For privacy reasons, your API key will be hidden after you click 'Connect'.

spoiler_free_mode.label: Spoiler Free Mode
spoiler_free_mode.description: Hide character definitions from the editor panel behind a spoiler button.

never_resize_avatars.label: Never resize avatars
never_resize_avatars.description: Avoid cropping and resizing imported character images. Disables the upload cropping popup.

send_on_enter.label: Enter to Send
send_on_enter.description: Determines if the Enter key sends a message.

auto_fix_generated_markdown.label: Auto-fix Markdown
auto_fix_generated_markdown.description: Automatically attempt to fix malformed markdown in AI-generated messages.

world_import_dialog.label: Lorebook Import Dialog
world_import_dialog.description: Ask to import World Info for new characters. If unchecked, a brief message will be shown instead.

confirm_message_delete.label: Confirm Message Deletion
confirm_message_delete.description: Show a confirmation dialog before deleting a chat message.

movingUI.label: Movable UI Elements
movingUI.description: Allow UI elements like the zoomed avatar viewer to be moved around and have multiple instances open.

zoomed_avatar_magnification.label: Magnify Zoomed Avatars
zoomed_avatar_magnification.description: Enable magnification effect when hovering over a zoomed-in avatar.

thumbnailColumns.label: Background Thumbnail Columns
thumbnailColumns.description: Number of columns for background thumbnails in the selector.

animation.label: Animated Backgrounds
animation.description: Enable animation for supported background formats (e.g., video, animated webp).
